name: training-employment
description: Training Employment Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run db:start" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" --names "🗄️ DB,🌐 API,🎨 UI" --prefix-colors "blue,green,cyan"
scripts.db:start: docker-compose up -d db && echo MongoDB started successfully
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: docker-compose down && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf __pycache__
